title: [Large-Scale] Innovative Computer Science Education Program Using Project-Based Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Web application development, programming languages, and foundational markup languages
context.additional_context: Targeting practicing professionals, this blended learning program (using digital devices) aims to strengthen workplace competencies. It consists of collaborative real-world project completion by learners from diverse backgrounds

learning_goals: Learners can independently perform the entire web application development process (planning-design-implementation-testing) through project-based learning.
Learners can create user-centered web interface prototypes using design thinking methodologies with over 80% learner satisfaction.
In a flipped learning environment, learners can complete pre-learning materials with over 90% completion and explain core concepts during discussion classes.
Learners can achieve over 85% course engagement by utilizing gamification elements (badges, leaderboards, etc.).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
